item.description: Distance marker on US-160 east to Teec Nos Pos and Four Corners.

item.title: US-160 East at BIA-35
item.description: US-160 east at BIA-35. Sweetwater is 14 miles to the south on BIA-35.

item.title: US-160 East at BIA-35
item.description: US-160 east approaching BIA-35 north to Montezuma Creek. Continue on US-160 east to Four Corners.
